trivia: Bedrock is the fictional town located in prehistory that is home to the characters of the hit animated television series The Flintstones.

In the episode "The Anvil or the Hammer", the address of Wayne Manor is briefly shown on an envelope. It is revealed as being "1007 Mountain Drive", which was the same address that was also stated to be Wayne Manor's location in the 1993 episode The Demon's Quest from Comics: The Animated Series.

The Los Robles Apartment Building, or simply The Building, refers to the apartment building located at 2311 North Los Robles Avenue, Pasadena, California that serves as the residence of Leonard Hofstadter and Sheldon Cooper.
The White Residence, located at 308 Negra Arroyo Lane, was the home of the White family including Walter, his wife Skyler, their son Walt Jr. and their infant daughter, Holly.
6353 Juan Tabo Blvd NE, Apt 6 was Gale Boetticher's apartment in Breaking Bad.
TV-Shows's 129 West 81st Street - the apartment building where Jerry and his neighbor Cosmo Kramer lived - is one of the most recognizable addresses in sitcom history.
Spooner Street is the street located west of downtown Quahog, Rhode Island where the Griffin Family, the Swanson family, Brown family and Quagmire currently reside.
